briefTitle: Effect of Roflumilast in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients Treated With Tiotropium: The HELIOS Study (BY217/M2-128)
officialTitle: Effect of Roflumilast in COPD Patients Treated With Tiotropium. A 24-week, Double-blind Study With 500 Âµg Roflumilast Once Daily Versus Placebo. The HELIOS Study
summary: The aim of the study is to compare the efficacy of roflumilast to placebo on pulmonary function and symptomatic parameters in patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) during concomitant administration of tiotropium. The study duration will last up to 28 weeks. The study will provide further data on safety and tolerability of roflumilast.

primaryOutcome.measure: Pre-bronchodilator Forced Expiratory Volume in First Second (FEV1)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Change from baseline over 24 weeks of treatment
